espnscrapeR 0.4.0
  • Reference

Get ESPN QBR for College football

Source: R/get_college_qbr.R
get_college_qbr.Rd

Get ESPN QBR for College football

get_college_qbr(season = 2020, week = NA)

Arguments

season

Numeric or character - greater than 2004
week

Numeric or character - typically 1 to 15 or Bowls

Value

tibble

Examples


# Get college QBR from 2011 season as a whole
get_college_qbr(season = 2011, week = NA)
#> Scraping QBR totals for 2011!
#> # A tibble: 122 x 19
#>    season week  first_name last_name name  short_name team_name team_short_name
#>     <dbl> <lgl> <chr>      <chr>     <chr> <chr>      <chr>     <chr>          
#>  1   2011 NA    Russell    Wilson    Russ… R. Wilson  Badgers   WIS            
#>  2   2011 NA    Kellen     Moore     Kell… K. Moore   Broncos   BSU            
#>  3   2011 NA    Andrew     Luck      Andr… A. Luck    Cardinal  STAN           
#>  4   2011 NA    Robert     Griffin … Robe… R. Griffi… Bears     BAY            
#>  5   2011 NA    Brandon    Weeden    Bran… B. Weeden  Cowboys   OKST           
#>  6   2011 NA    Matt       Barkley   Matt… M. Barkley Trojans   USC            
#>  7   2011 NA    Case       Keenum    Case… C. Keenum  Cougars   HOU            
#>  8   2011 NA    AJ         McCarron  AJ M… A. McCarr… Crimson … ALA            
#>  9   2011 NA    Connor     Shaw      Conn… C. Shaw    Gamecocks SC             
#> 10   2011 NA    Dan        Persa     Dan … D. Persa   Wildcats  NW             
#> # … with 112 more rows, and 11 more variables: row_n <int>, qbr_total <dbl>,
#> #   points_added <dbl>, qb_plays <dbl>, total_epa <dbl>, pass <dbl>, run <dbl>,
#> #   exp_sack <dbl>, penalty <dbl>, raw_qbr <dbl>, sack <dbl>

# Get college QBR from 2019 season week 1
get_college_qbr(2019, 1)
#> Scraping QBR for week 1 of 2019!
#> # A tibble: 82 x 19
#>    season  week first_name last_name name  short_name team_name team_short_name
#>     <dbl> <dbl> <chr>      <chr>     <chr> <chr>      <chr>     <chr>          
#>  1   2019     1 Joe        Burrow    Joe … J. Burrow  Tigers    LSU            
#>  2   2019     1 Joe        Burrow    Joe … J. Burrow  Tigers    LSU            
#>  3   2019     1 Sam        Howell    Sam … S. Howell  Tar Heels UNC            
#>  4   2019     1 Mac        Jones     Mac … M. Jones   Crimson … ALA            
#>  5   2019     1 Ian        Book      Ian … I. Book    Fighting… ND             
#>  6   2019     1 Kedon      Slovis    Kedo… K. Slovis  Trojans   USC            
#>  7   2019     1 Dustin     Crum      Dust… D. Crum    Golden F… KENT           
#>  8   2019     1 Nathan     Rourke    Nath… N. Rourke  Bobcats   OHIO           
#>  9   2019     1 Malik      Cunningh… Mali… M. Cunnin… Cardinals LOU            
#> 10   2019     1 Trevor     Lawrence  Trev… T. Lawren… Tigers    CLEM           
#> # … with 72 more rows, and 11 more variables: row_n <int>, qbr_total <dbl>,
#> #   points_added <dbl>, qb_plays <dbl>, total_epa <dbl>, pass <dbl>, run <dbl>,
#> #   exp_sack <dbl>, penalty <dbl>, raw_qbr <dbl>, sack <dbl>
